data.description:
Generated by orchestration session orch-1771568848826-x9e0uk.
Objective: Deliver ReTakes view showing closed beads sorted by last-updated timestamp, with robust UX states and verification.
Agent plan:
- 1 x backend (bead query and sort contract)
- 1 x frontend (view, routing, and states)
- 1 x qa (regression and ordering validation)
Assigned beads:
- foolery-seev: add a view ReTakes that shows closed beads in order of last updated
Notes: Scene 1 (serial): lock filter/sort contract for closed beads. Scene 2 (parallel): backend selector/query and frontend route/view scaffold. Scene 3 (serial): integrate data and state handling (loading, empty, error). Scene 4 (serial): automated and manual validation of ordering and closed-only membership.
Assumptions:
- Closed beads can be identified from existing bead status values without schema changes.
- Each bead has a reliable updated timestamp usable for descending sort.
- ReTakes can be added as a new view entry without altering existing workflow semantics.
